title: 2009/807/EC: Council Decision of 21 October 2009 appointing one Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
4.11.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 288/24
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 October 2009
appointing one Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2009/807/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Spanish Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) An alternate member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Enrique OJEDA VILA,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as an alternate member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
— Mr Miguel LUCENA BARRANQUERO, Secretario General de Acción Exterior, Andalucía.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 21 October 2009.
For the Council
The President
A. CARLGREN
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
